scripts.dev: cross-env PORT=3021 nodemon --watch . -e "ts" --exec "npx ts-node -P tsconfig.json server.ts"
scripts.dev:prod: source ../../.env.prod; PORT=3021 nodemon --watch . -e "ts" --exec "npx ts-node -P tsconfig.json server.ts"
scripts.serve:prod: while true; do env $(cat ../../.env.prod | xargs) NODE_ENV=production PORT=3021 ts-node -P tsconfig.json server.ts || true; done
scripts.serve:staging: while true; do env $(cat ../../.env.staging | xargs) NODE_ENV=production PORT=4021 ts-node -P tsconfig.json server.ts || true; done
